auth.signInToContinue: Sign in to continue building your resume
auth.getStartedWithResume: Get started with your professional resume

home.heroDescription: Create professional resumes tailored for US, EU, and Ukrainian markets. Our AI helps you write compelling content and reviews your resume for maximum impact.
home.noCreditCard: No credit card required. Free forever for 1 resume.
home.featuresTitle: Everything you need to land your dream job
home.featuresSubtitle: Powerful features to help you create, optimize, and export professional resumes
home.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of job seekers who have landed their dream jobs with Resumeyro
home.heroMainDescription: Upload your old resume or just describe yourself. Our AI creates a professional, ATS-friendly resume in seconds.
home.howItWorksTitle: From old resume to polished PDF
home.howItWorksSubtitle: Already have a resume? Upload it and let AI enhance, update, and format it beautifully.
home.step1Description: Drop your old resume, LinkedIn PDF, or just tell us about yourself. AI extracts everything.
home.step2Description: Our AI writes compelling content, optimizes for ATS, and formats everything beautifully.
home.step3Description: Export a pixel-perfect PDF. Tweak anything in the canvas editor if you want.
home.regionalTitle: Your resume, tailored for your market
home.regionalDescription: Different countries have different resume standards. US employers expect no photo. European CVs follow Europass. Ukrainian resumes are formal with photos. We handle it all.
home.pricingSubtitle: Start free. Upgrade when you need more AI power.
home.finalCtaNote: No credit card required. Your first resume is free forever.
home.faq1Answer: Yes! You can create one resume completely free, forever. No credit card required. Upgrade to Pro or Premium only if you need more resumes or AI generations.
home.faq2Question: What is ATS and why does it matter?
home.faq2Answer: ATS (Applicant Tracking System) is software used by employers to filter resumes. Our templates are optimized to pass ATS filters while still looking professional.
home.faq3Question: Can I update my existing resume?
home.faq3Answer: Yes! Upload your old resume (PDF or image) and our AI will extract all information, enhance it, and create a polished new version you can edit further.

features.canvasEditorDesc: Drag-and-drop editor with full customization. Add text, shapes, images, and more.
features.aiWritingAssistantDesc: Generate professional summaries, experience bullets, and skills with AI.
features.smartImportDesc: Upload any resume or LinkedIn PDF. AI extracts and organizes everything automatically.
features.aiResumeReviewDesc: Get detailed feedback and suggestions to improve your resume's impact.
features.pdfExportDesc: Export high-quality PDFs ready to send to employers.
features.atsOptimizedDesc: Resumes optimized for Applicant Tracking Systems used by employers.

aiBuilder.promptPlaceholder: E.g., Create a resume for a Senior Angular Developer with 8 years of experience, focusing on enterprise applications and team leadership...
aiBuilder.tipText: Include specific details like job title, years of experience, key skills, and target industry for best results.
aiBuilder.tipHint: Add details: position, experience, skills, industry

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works best for you. Upgrade or downgrade anytime.
pricing.faq1Answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.
pricing.faq2Question: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.faq2Answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) through Stripe.
pricing.faq3Question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
pricing.faq3Answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. The difference will be prorated.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how Resumeyro collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
privacy.section1_1_account: Account Information: Email address, name, and password when you create an account
privacy.section1_1_resume: Resume Data: Work experience, education, skills, and other professional information you enter
privacy.section1_1_files: Uploaded Files: Resumes, photos, and documents you upload to our service
privacy.section1_1_payment: Payment Information: Billing details processed securely through Stripe (we do not store credit card numbers)
privacy.section1_2_usage: Usage Data: Pages visited, features used, and actions taken within the app
privacy.section1_2_device: Device Information: Browser type, operating system, and device identifiers
privacy.section1_2_cookies: Cookies: Session data and preferences (see Cookie section below)
privacy.section2_provide: Provide Services: Create and manage your resumes, process AI-powered features
privacy.section2_improve: Improve the Product: Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience
privacy.section2_payments: Process Payments: Handle subscriptions and billing through Stripe
privacy.section2_communications: Send Communications: Account notifications, security alerts, and optional marketing (with consent)
privacy.section2_security: Ensure Security: Detect and prevent fraud, abuse, and security threats
privacy.section3_intro: We use third-party AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google) to power our resume generation and review features:
privacy.section3_sent: Your resume content is sent to AI providers for processing
privacy.section3_retain: AI providers may retain data according to their own privacy policies
privacy.section3_noTrain: We do not use your data to train AI models
privacy.section3_deletion: You can request deletion of your data at any time
privacy.section4_intro: We do not sell your personal information. We share data only with:
privacy.section4_providers: Service Providers: Stripe (payments), AI providers (content generation), hosting services
privacy.section4_legal: Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.section4_business: Business Transfers: In case of merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
privacy.section5_intro: We implement industry-standard security measures including:
privacy.section5_https: HTTPS encryption for all data transmission
privacy.section6_intro: Depending on your location (GDPR, CCPA), you have the right to:
privacy.section6_access: Access: Request a copy of your personal data
privacy.section6_correction: Correction: Update or correct inaccurate information
privacy.section6_deletion: Deletion: Request deletion of your account and data
privacy.section6_contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at {email}
privacy.section7_analytics: Analytics: Understanding how users interact with our service (optional)
privacy.section7_control: You can control cookies through your browser settings.
privacy.section8_intro: We retain your data for as long as your account is active. After account deletion:
privacy.section8_30days: Personal data is deleted within 30 days
privacy.section8_legal: Some data may be retained for legal compliance
privacy.section9_text: Your data may be processed in countries outside your residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, including Standard Contractual Clauses where required.
privacy.section10_text: Our service is not intended for users under 16 years old. We do not knowingly collect data from children.
privacy.section11_text: We may update this policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or in-app notification.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Please read these terms carefully before using Resumeyro. By using our service, you agree to these terms.
terms.section1_text1: By accessing or using Resumeyro ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the Service.
terms.section1_text2: We may modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
terms.section2_intro: Resumeyro is an AI-powered resume building platform that provides:
terms.section2_templates: Professional templates for various markets (US, EU, Ukraine)
terms.section3_1_text: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials.
terms.section3_2_text: You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.
terms.section3_3_text: You must be at least 16 years old to use the Service. By using Resumeyro, you represent that you meet this requirement.
terms.section4_1_text: We offer free and paid subscription plans. Paid plans provide additional features as described on our pricing page.
terms.section4_2_monthly: Paid subscriptions are billed monthly or annually
terms.section4_2_price: Prices may change with 30 days notice
terms.section4_3_cancel: You can cancel your subscription at any time
terms.section4_3_end: Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period
terms.section4_3_refund: Refunds are provided within 7 days of purchase if you haven't used AI features
terms.section5_illegal: Use the Service for any illegal purpose
terms.section5_security: Attempt to bypass security measures or access restrictions
terms.section5_automated: Use automated tools to access the Service without permission
terms.section5_share: Share your account with others or resell access
terms.section6_1_text: You retain ownership of the content you create. By using the Service, you grant us a license to store, process, and display your content as necessary to provide the Service.
terms.section6_2_text: The Service, including templates, designs, and software, is owned by Resumeyro. You may not copy, modify, or redistribute our content without permission.
terms.section6_3_text: Content generated by AI based on your input belongs to you. However, similar content may be generated for other users based on their input.
terms.section7_intro: Our AI features are powered by third-party providers. You acknowledge that:
terms.section7_accuracy: AI-generated content may not always be accurate or appropriate
terms.section7_review: You are responsible for reviewing and editing AI suggestions
terms.section7_limits: AI usage is subject to fair use limits based on your plan
terms.section7_modify: We may modify or discontinue AI features with notice
terms.section8_text: Your use of the Service is subject to our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.
terms.section9_1_text: The Service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation.
terms.section9_2_text: We do not guarantee that resumes created with our Service will result in job interviews or employment. Success depends on many factors beyond our control.
terms.section9_3_text: We are not responsible for third-party services (Stripe, AI providers) used in connection with the Service.
terms.section10_intro: To the maximum extent permitted by law:
terms.section10_indirect: We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
terms.section10_total: Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid us in the past 12 months
terms.section10_data: We are not liable for data loss; you should maintain backups
terms.section11_text: You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of the Service or violation of these Terms.
terms.section12_intro: We may suspend or terminate your account if you violate these Terms. Upon termination:
terms.section12_ends: Your right to use the Service ends immediately
terms.section12_delete: We may delete your data after 30 days
terms.section12_survive: Sections that should survive termination will remain in effect
terms.section13_text: These Terms are governed by the laws of Ukraine. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Kyiv, Ukraine, unless local consumer protection laws require otherwise.
terms.section14_text: Before filing a legal claim, you agree to try to resolve disputes informally by contacting us. If we cannot resolve the dispute within 30 days, either party may proceed with legal action.
terms.section15_entire: Entire Agreement: These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and Resumeyro
terms.section15_severability: Severability: If any provision is unenforceable, the rest remains in effect
terms.section15_waiver: No Waiver: Our failure to enforce a right does not waive that right
terms.section15_assignment: Assignment: You may not transfer your rights under these Terms
